patterns: How do I get my Transfer Certificate?

responses: Draft a letter to the Principal and specify the reason for you leaving the school, the signature of both parents must be present on the letter.

patterns: I want to pay the fees

How to pay the school fee

What ways can I pay the school fee
responses: Fees can be paid online or DD in the school office. Cash and Cheque will not be accepted. Login to Pupilpod > Click on school fees in the Home Page > click on View or Pay Now.

Fee can be paid online or via DD in the school office. Cash and Cheque will not be accepted. You can follow the given procedure: Login to Pupilpod > Click on school fees in the Home Page > click on View or Pay Now.

patterns: i did not get my id card
i did not receive my ID Card
why have I not got my ID Card
I applied for my school student ID card weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. What should I do?
My classmate applied for their school student ID card after me, but they received it already. Why haven't I received mine?
I checked the school's system, and it says my student ID card was issued, but I never received it. What can I do?
I moved recently. Could that be why I haven't received my school student ID card?
Who should I contact to report that I haven't received my school student ID card?
Is there an option for expedited delivery if my school student ID card hasn't arrived within the expected timeframe?
My school student ID card was supposed to be distributed last week, but it still hasn't arrived. What could be the reason?
I received a notification that my school student ID card was distributed, but it hasn't arrived yet. What should I do?
responses: Kindly make sure you have uploaded the Pictures of Student (In School Uniform), Father and Mother Photo on Pupilpod. Incase of Lost or duplicate ID Card, please approach the office.

patterns: What is my MS Teams username and password?
responses: The username is the Student ID followed by '@sjbhs.edu.in' (eg: SJ21E12345@sjbhs.edu.in). For the password, please contace the office.

patterns: I lost my pass certificate, what should I do?
responses: Kindly obtain a FIR copy from Police Station and thereafter enclose copy of FIR and a copy of the Lost Pass Certificate along with a charge of Rs.775/- as levied by the Council.
Please bring a copy of Marks and Pass Certificate to the school office.

patterns: Where can i find my report card.
responses: Login to Pupilpod> Click on Progress report in the Home Page> View or download the respective exam report card.

patterns: How to upload photographs on pupilpod.
i want to change photograph on pupilpod
responses: Login to Pupilpod> Click on View Details in Student profile> Click on Upload option and browse the photo from your device and upload> To upload Parents Photo> Click on Family option> Click on Upload option and browse the photo from your device and upload it
